item.title: About us
item.description: About Scrum Training We focus on helping organizations/teams to transform their way of working to real Scrum. 关于 Bob Jiang Please visit Bob Jiang Blog

item.title: Training
item.description: Trainings we offer We offer Scrum/Agile trainings as following: Advanced Certified Scrum Master - A-CSM Certified Scrum Product Owner - CSPO Certified Scrum Master - CSM Impact Mapping Management 3.
